trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> store is opened, the result is represented by an X509Certificate2Collection object.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>archivio viene aperto, il risultato è rappresentato da un oggetto X509Certificate2Collection.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an X509Certificate2Collection as a memory store of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Se si ha familiarità con i costrutti di crittografia API non gestiti, è possibile considerare un X509Certificate2Collection come archivio di memoria di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>oggetti.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class without any <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> classe senza <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> informazioni.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto, che differisce dagli altri costruttori che consente di creare l'oggetto certificato o una raccolta di informazioni.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> classe utilizzando un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to start the collection from.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto da cui iniziare l'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> usando una matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> classe tramite la raccolta di certificato specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto alla fine di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method adds an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>oggetto da una raccolta e restituisce la posizione di indice del certificato.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: An X.509 certificate represented as an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un certificato x.&509; rappresentato come un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the certificate has been added.
trans-unit.target: Il indice in corrispondenza del quale il certificate è stato aggiunto.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge più <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetti in una matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to add to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo se si dispone di una matrice di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>oggetti da aggiungere a un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The AddRange and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Il AddRange e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metodi elaborano le richieste tramite transazioni, pertanto, se una singola aggiunta o rimozione ha esito negativo, l'intera operazione viene interrotta.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object to another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge più <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> gli oggetti in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto a un altro <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to add to another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo se si dispone di certificati in un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto che si desidera aggiungere a un altro <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metodi elaborano le richieste tramite transazioni, pertanto, se una singola aggiunta o rimozione ha esito negativo, l'intera operazione viene interrotta.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object contains a specific certificate.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto contiene un certificato specifico.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue una ricerca lineare. Pertanto, il tempo medio di esecuzione è proporzionale al <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è un'operazione O (`n`) operazione, in cui `n` è <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo determina l'uguaglianza chiamando il <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto da individuare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: if the contains the specified certificate; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se il contiene l'oggetto specificato certificate ; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Esporta le informazioni sul certificato x.&509; in una matrice di byte.

trans-unit.source: This method supports content types that do not require a password.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta i tipi di contenuto che non richiedono una password.

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Supportato <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sul certificato x.&509; in una matrice di byte.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
trans-unit.target: Esporta le informazioni sul certificato x.&509; in una matrice di byte con una password.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta i seguenti <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>tipi:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Supportato <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A string used to protect the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Stringa utilizzata per proteggere la matrice di byte.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sul certificato x.&509; in una matrice di byte.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Il certificato è illeggibile, il contenuto non è valido o, nel caso di un certificato che richiedono una password, la chiave privata potrebbe non essere esportata perché la password fornita non è corretta.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object using the search criteria specified by the enumeration and the findValue object.
trans-unit.target: Ricerche un utilizzando criteri di ricerca specificati per il enumerazione e findValue oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to find <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects if no user interaction is needed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per trovare <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>oggetti se non è necessario alcun intervento dell'utente.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Use the Find method to allow the user to select <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Find per consentire all'utente di selezionare <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>oggetti.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che questo metodo può essere utilizzato in uno stile CSS o annidato, restringere i criteri di ricerca con ogni chiamata al metodo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The search criteria as an object.
trans-unit.target: I criteri di ricerca come oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow only valid certificates to be returned from the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per consentire solo i certificati validi essere restituiti dalla ricerca. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: findType is invalid.
trans-unit.target: findTypenon è valido.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che può scorrere una <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Gli enumeratori consentono l'accesso in sola lettura ai dati nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile utilizzare enumeratori per modificare la raccolta sottostante.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"></xref> object that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"> </xref> oggetto che può scorrere il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un certificato sotto forma di una matrice di byte in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo importa un certificato sotto forma di una matrice di byte in un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta i seguenti <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>tipi:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di byte contenente i dati di un certificato x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un file di certificato in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta i seguenti <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>tipi:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file contenente le informazioni sul certificato.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un certificato, sotto forma di matrice di byte che richiede una password per accedere al certificato, in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere utilizzato con un file PFX/PKCS12 BLOB binary large object () protetto da password.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare contenitori di chiavi associati ai certificati nell'oggetto BLOB PFX/PKCS12 e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>valore può essere utilizzato per controllare questo processo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che se non si crea un contenitore di chiavi, la chiave privata non è persistente.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo importa una matrice di byte del certificato in una raccolta di certificati.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta i seguenti <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>tipi:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di byte contenente i dati da un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: La password necessaria per accedere alle informazioni del certificato.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit dei valori di enumerazione che controllano come e dove il certificato viene importato.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un file di certificato che richiede una password in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere utilizzato con un file PFX/PKCS12 o altri file di certificato che richiedono una password.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare contenitori di chiavi associati ai certificati nel file PFX/PKCS12 e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>valore può essere utilizzato per controllare questo processo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che se non si crea un contenitore di chiavi, la chiave privata non è persistente.

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che un file PFX/PKCS12 può contenere più di un certificato.

trans-unit.source: This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di importare il primo certificato associato alla chiave privata o, se non viene trovata alcuna chiave privata, il primo certificato trovato.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta i seguenti <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>tipi:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file contenente le informazioni sul certificato.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: La password necessaria per accedere alle informazioni del certificato.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit dei valori di enumerazione che controllano come e dove il certificato viene importato.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto nella <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property already equals the capacity of the list, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>proprietà è già pari alla capacità dell'elenco, la capacità viene raddoppiata automaticamente mediante la riallocazione della matrice interna prima che venga inserito il nuovo elemento.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è uguale a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` viene aggiunto alla fine della raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `certificate`.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale inserire `certificate`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto da inserire.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - index è maggiore di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: -or- The collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - la raccolta ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di accedere a un elemento specifico nella raccolta utilizzando la sintassi seguente: `myCollection[index]`.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da ottenere o impostare.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - index è uguale a o maggiore di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: index is .
trans-unit.target: indexis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza di un certificato da di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo rimuove la prima occorrenza di un certificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to be removed from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere dal <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove più <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> gli oggetti in una matrice da un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to remove from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo se si dispone di una matrice di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>oggetti da rimuovere da un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and RemoveRange methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>e metodi RemoveRange elaborano le richieste tramite transazioni, pertanto, se una singola aggiunta o rimozione ha esito negativo, l'intera operazione viene interrotta.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove più <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> gli oggetti in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto da un altro <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to remove from another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo se si dispone di certificati in un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto che si desidera rimuovere da un altro <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metodi elaborano le richieste tramite transazioni, pertanto, se una singola aggiunta o rimozione ha esito negativo, l'intera operazione viene interrotta.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .
